item.title: Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat (jointly with IIT Kharagpur) received ANRF ARG Research Grant
item.description:
We are delighted to share that Prof. Abhishek Bichhawat, in collaboration with Prof. Mainack Mondal from IIT Kharagpur, has been awarded the ANRF ARG Research Grant for their proposal on designing a usable and privacy-compliant consent management framework for online browsing.

Read more about the award on Prof. Mainack Mondal’s LinkedIn post: https://www.linkedin.com/posts/mainack-mondal-73a1427_anrf-arg-anrf-activity-7408063928557023232-4jVN
